timeline.message: Jump through some styling hoops to get category checkboxes aligned to top, and counts aligned to top-right
Don't be so dense, ListItem. I had this in while testing styling fixes. It wasn't intended to go in
Take away padding from the right of Catergory list items. Because it looked unbalanced, and too narrow
Use less dodgy custom styling, so the different categories don't go haywire
rejigged the themeing, so it doesn't break the autotests :(
abandon grid for category term display, and make the checkbox ripple look less squished
